name: Opinel No18 Saw
description: A specialized tool fine-tuned for cutting branches 12cm or less in diameter. The blade’s sharp teeth make cutting clean, even and effortless. Excellent for trail maintenance or cutting smaller firewood.Natural varnished beech handle fits comfortably in the hand and minimizes the chance of blisters.Serrated 18cm stainless steel blade cuts on the pull.Locking blade prevents accidental closure.
